TopicTitle: KSP2 could bring Animation to the KSP Comminity

Articles.Content: In one of the show and tell videos I noticed that one of the developers of KSP2 was animating a Kerbal. This may not sound like much to you but what if the devs shared those animation files? At glance you may think, eh, not that useful. I was just like that until I though, what if animators used these animation files to creat KSP amd KSP2 animations or movies! Wouldn’t that be so great!
Animation files? You can already animate kerbals, and create movies with them. Think about all the trailers for KSP
